products.title: Orient Faux Silk Indigo Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Orient Faux Silk Indigo Blue Roman Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £14.99 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Orient Faux-Silk roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. 
 This Indigo Blue faux-silk roman blind, introduces a medium blue shade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting accessories. 
 Add a touch of luxury to your home with our hand-made roman blinds. At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a FREE five year warranty, for extra peace of mind. 
 
 Product ID: DB-IROM0021 Fabric Colour: Indigo Blue Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Velvet Sky Light Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Velvet Sky Light Blue Roman Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £17.59 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home.  A multi-tonal fabric, our smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day.  From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. 
 
This soft roman blind in Sky Light Blue, introduces a refreshing blue hue to your home.  A light blue adds a refreshing finish to your window, and this velvet blue roman blind creates a decadent look for a fraction of the price on the high street. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, not only is this roman blind made by the experts at our Yorkshire factory, but with over 50 years experience, our roman blinds are made to last.  Our roman blinds come with five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, and customer-first service!   
 
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM1164 Fabric Colour: Sky Light Blue Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.productdescription:
This textured geometric fabric is simple yet effective at creative depth, whilst adding a soft pop of colour to your home. 
 
Your new Geometric Metallic Denim Blue roman blind, blends a trend dark blue shade with interwoven reflective silver threadwork to help create a modern, inspiring final look. 
  
 At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new roman blind comes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM1194 Fabric Colour: Metallic Denim Blue Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.metadescription: Shimmer Indigo Blue Roman Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £23.65 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

products.title: Lottie Sky Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Lottie Sky Blue Roman Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £23.65 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Grace your interior with the luxurious look of the Lottie Sky Blue Roman Blind. The compact folding design is a great way to bring shading and soft decorative detail to your window whilst keeping a smart and classic look. This stunning jacquard fabric design features graceful movement and detail thanks to the pattern of delicate foliage.
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM1056 Fabric Colour: Sky Blue Material: 75% Polyester 25% Cotton Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Alice Bluebell Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Alice Bluebell Roman Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £23.65 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A delicate dance of floral pattern woven in a jacquard style gives this window blind a rich and timeless sense, which is beautifully balanced by the pale blue-grey colourway. The Alice Bluebell Roman Blind will make a gorgeous feature of any window whilst providing excellent and convenient shading thanks to the quality polyester-cotton blend fabric and smooth folding design. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM1042 Fabric Colour: Bluebell Material: 75% Polyester 25% Cotton Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Botanical Garden Seaspray Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Botanical Garden Seaspray Blue Roman Blind in Yellow/Blue/Green/Multicoloured. Made to measure from £23.65 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Lilies, bluebells, peonies, and all things flowery make up this Botanical roman blind. 
 
With dragonflies, busy bees and delicate butterflies dotting this seaspray blue roman blind, with splashes of warm yellows and greens, this roman blind will look at home in your kitchen, office or bedroom. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new roman blind comes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM1187 Fabric Colour: Seaspray Blue Material: 100% Cotton Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Bumblebee Mineral Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Bumblebee Mineral Blue Roman Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £26.40 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Hang this linen mix blind against bright ochre walls, or deep blues and greys for an entirely distinct effect. You can choose to hang this in any room, whether it be an office or hallway, down to more humid rooms such as bathrooms and kitchens because we’ve manufactured the Bumblebee mineral blue roman blind from a marvellous combination of cotton and linen to ensure the fabric breathes whilst holding ample folds.  
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM1082 Fabric Colour: Mineral Blue Material: 90% Cotton 10% Linen Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Gingko Ocean Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Gingko Ocean Blue Roman Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £26.40 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
If you’re looking for a soft roman blind that will fall loosely within your window then look no further. The gentle curves within the tapestry on the Gingko blind in ocean will delight you with its fluid blues. As the pattern is sewn into the fabric, it adds another dimension to long windows and smaller accents alike. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM1110 Fabric Colour: Ocean Blue Material: 91% Polyester 9% Cotton Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Dragonfly Mineral Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Dragonfly Mineral Blue Roman Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £26.40 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bring nature into your home with the Azure mineral blue roman blind. The serious deep tones of this linen mix blind are balanced with a buoyant sketch of dragonflies to add the perfect dynamic to your home. We’ve prepared the blind from a delicious weave of cotton and linen so it’s suitable for wherever you choose to hang it.

 Being at the seaside is fantastic. It is even better to bring the feeling of being at the seaside to your home with this multicoloured roller blind.
